CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV leaves room and shuts door
MOT squats beside CHI and fixes CHIs pants
<bef> MOT starts to sit down then stops in mid-action
<$=3> MOT looks around the room while having arm around CHI
CHI holds onto MOTs arm and looks around room
MOT sits down on the floor behind CHI
MOT looks at the camera and nods at it with her head
CHI continues to look around the room then at MOT
MOT looks back at the camera then at CHI
CHI sits down on the floor
MOT and CHI are sitting on the floor facing each other with some toys between them
CHI pushes on the side of a jack+in+the+box
MOT moves a little farther away from CHI
MOT takes off her shoes then sits cross+legged facing CHI
<bef> MOT started to pick up jack+in+the+box then stopped and pulled her hand back
MOT rolls the jack+in+the+box back towards CHI so it is upright
CHI puts her hand on the jack+in+the+box after MOT rolls it to her
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box just a little . <aft> MOT rolls a toy car on the rug in front of her
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box then at a rubber duck behind the jack+in+the+box
CHI plays with a rubber duck
MOT stops playing with the toy car
MOT watches CHI and smiles at her
CHI continues to play with the duck
<$=1> MOT takes rubber duck from CHI then holds it is her hands examining it
MOT squeezes duck so it makes noise
CHI feels the jack+in+the+box with one hand
CHI looks around at the toys on the floor
MOT sets duck down on rug
CHI reaches out for football then pulls her hand back
MOT holds football in both hands and looks at it
MOT holds football out to CHI
CHI looks at football then reaches out to touch it
CHI pulls her hand back from football
MOT sets the football down on the rug
CHI reaches for the book in front of her on the floor
CHI pulls the book onto her lap
CHI looks down to her side
CHI grabs football with one hand and pushes it on the rug then lets go of it
CHI reaches out and grabs the rubber duck
MOT takes duck from CHI and looks at it
MOT squeezes duck to make it squeak . <aft> MOT holds duck to her cheek giving it a hug
CHI hits top of jack+in+the+box with one hand
MOT holds duckie in both hands in front of her looking at it then squeezes it a few times
<$=1> MOT sets duck down then holds jack+in+the+box steady and turns its handle
CHI watches what MOT is doing to jack+in+the+box
MOT glances at CHI then back at jack+in+the+box
CHI reaches out and tries to turn the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT continues turning the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT sits back and lets go of jack+in+the+box
CHI touches head of jack+in+the+box then pulls her hand back
CHI watches what MOT is doing to jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to close lid on jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes the jack+in+the+box back into its box
MOT lets go of the lid
CHI leans close and places a hand on the lid of the jack+in+the+box
CHI lets go of the lid and the jack+in+the+box pops up
CHI holds onto head of jack+in+the+box and tries to push it back into the box
CHI lets go of jack+in+the+box and looks away
MOT grabs head of jack+in+the+box and pushes it into the box
CHI looks back at jack+in+the+box and watches MOT
CHI opens the lid letting the jack+in+the+box out
MOT holds jack+in+the+box steady and turns its handle to make music
CHI picks up the jack+in+the+box by its head
CHI pushes the clown back into the box
CHI lets go of clown's head and it pops back up
MOT watches CHI play with clown
CHI lets go of clown's hand and grabs his head
CHI pushes the clown's head down into the box
CHI lets go of clown's head and it pops back up
CHI looks at clown's head then looks away
CHI pushes clown's head back down
CHI pokes clown's head with index finger
MOT points to clown's nose with index finger
MOT points to clown's nose with index finger again
<aft> CHI explores clown's body with her hand then holds clown's hand
MOT moves her hand making a squeezing motion as she says hand
CHI grabs the duck in her hand
CHI holds duck out to MOT
MOT takes duck from CHI and holds it to her cheek
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box and puts her hand on it
MOT still holds duck to cheek
MOT holds duck in front of her with both hands and squeaks it
CHI looks at duck then away at floor
MOT puts duck back up to her cheek then down in front of her and squeaks it again
CHI reaches for toy car in front of her
MOT looks down at duck then over at CHI
CHI reaches out in front of her for the car then rolls it on the floor towards her
MOT continues to hold and softly squeeze the duck
CHI lets go of car and pats the jack+in+the+box on the head then grabs the car again
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box then back at car
CHI picks up car and gives it to MOT
MOT puts duck in the car and sets them on the floor
MOT stops car in front of CHI
CHI picks duck up out of car
CHI holds the duck out in front of her while looking at it
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box then back at duck then up at door
CHI watches as INV takes object out of drawer and sets it on the table
CHI looks down at table then back up at object
CHI reaches out and touches object
MOT lightly pushes CHIs hand away from object
CHI puts hand back down on table
CHI follows movement of balls with eyes and head
CHI reaches up and grabs a ball on the object
MOT removes CHIs hand from object
CHI looks down at table then back up at object . <aft> CHI reaches to touch object again
MOT intercepts CHIs hand and puts his hand on the table
MOT tickles the back of CHIs hand with her fingers
CHI reaches to touch object again
MOT tickles the top of CHIs arm with her fingers pushing CHIs arm away from object and back down on the table
CHI continues to stare at object
MOT tickles top of CHIs hand
CHI grabs a ball of the object
MOT pulls CHIs hand off object
CHI continues to look at object
CHI turns and looks at floor
INV picks up object and puts it back in drawer
INV explains parent-child interaction boxes then leaves the room
MOT sits down on floor with ball in box
CHI stands in front of MOT watching her
MOT takes the ball out of the box and holds it up for CHI to see
MOT shakes her head no while looking at CHI
CHI looks at MOT then back at floor and points to floor
MOT tosses ball from one hand to the other
CHI looks at what MOT is doing with ball
<$=2> MOT tosses the ball in the air then catches it
MOT moves box and sets it on end
<aft> MOT tosses the ball up in the air
CHI looks from box to ball
MOT tosses ball in the air and catches it
MOT tosses ball in the air again
MOT drops ball on floor near CHI
CHI turns towards table and grabs the back of the chair accidentally kicking the ball
CHI gets chair out from under table
MOT rolls ball into box on the floor
CHI pulls chair into middle of room
CHI lets go of chair and walks back over to table and holds onto another chair
MOT sets chair on top of desk
CHI watches what MOT does with chair
MOT puts hands on back of chair CHI is leaning on
MOT pulls chair back from table
CHI follows chair and tries to climb on to it
MOT stands up and steps off screen
CHI continues trying to get on chair
MOT takes box off table and brings it to rug
CHI glances at MOT then back at chair
MOT sets box down and sits facing CHI
CHI kneels on chair and looks at box
CHI continues to look at box
MOT opens box then shuts the lid quickly
CHI tries to get down from chair
MOT takes blanket out of box and shuts the lid
MOT holds ball out to CHI
ball falls off MOTs hand onto floor
CHI looks at ball on floor
MOT picks up ball and tosses it in the air catching it
CHI watches MOT pick up ball on floor
<aft> CHI gets off chair and stands watching MOT
CHI walks to box and takes ball out
CHI tries to step over MOTs leg
MOT moves box so CHI can walk around
CHI walks over and looks in trash can
MOT turns and looks in basket
MOT holds the ball over the basket
CHI continues to look in basket
MOT drops the ball in the basket
CHI looks at MOT then back at ball
MOT looks in basket at ball
CHI starts to pull bag out of trash can
MOT takes bag from CHI and puts it back in can
MOT takes ball out of basket and tosses it and catches it
CHI continues to look in trash can
CHI tries to pull bag out of can again
MOT takes bag from CHI and puts it back in can
CHI watches what MOT is doing
MOT puts trash can on top of table
CHI watches MOT move trash can
CHI watches ball then looks away
MOT holds up blanket then sets it back down
CHI walks around end of table
MOT gets up and goes to CHI
CHI looks at MOT then back around table
CHI tries to continue walking around table
MOT grabs CHI and picks her up
MOT carries CHI back to rug and sets her down
MOT holds blanket up in front of CHIs face
CHI walks away from MOT and pushes the blanket away from her
CHI walks to chair and grabs on to its back
MOT tosses the blanket over CHIs head
CHI pulls blanket off and throws it on the floor
CHI walks around side of chair towards back of table
MOT uses the blanket to make a wall between the chair and the table thereby blocking the CHIs way
CHI stops and looks at MOT blocking the way
MOT hides her head behind the blanket
MOT raises her head above the blanket and looks at CHI then ducks behind the blanket again
CHI runs back around other side of chair then falls near MOTs lap
MOT sits up and looks at CHI
MOT holds up blanket over CHI
MOT holds blanket in front of her face so CHI can't see her
CHI stands up and looks at MOT
MOT pulls down blanket so CHI can see her
MOT pulls blanket back up covering her face
CHI grabs bottom of blanket and walks towards MOT
MOT pulls down blanket and smiles at CHI
CHI walks backwards and falls down
MOT covers her face with blanket then pulls it down and looks at CHI when she hears CHI fall
CHI gets up and runs over to ball
CHI picks up ball and shows it to MOT
<aft> CHI carries ball over to MOT and gives it to her
MOT takes the ball from CHI
CHI walks over to bag by wall
MOT tosses ball in the air and catches it
MOT picks up bag and sets it on table
CHI walks back over to rug
CHI stands looking at box on floor
CHI continues to look at box
MOT shuts the lid on the box quickly
MOT opens the box's lid again
MOT blocks the camera while holding up the box lid
CHI bends down and looks in box
MOT takes lid all the way off box
CHI picks up crayon and looks at it
MOT takes a crayon and draws then stops
CHI drops first crayon and picks up another
CHI stands up and walks towards MOT and holds a crayon out to MOT
CHI stands up and hands MOT a crayon
CHI bends down and picks up another crayon then stands back up and hands the crayon to MOT
MOT leans over paper and draws
CHI lifts corner of box that paper is in then drops it
CHI tries to step into box
MOT moves box so CHI misses
CHI picks up box and gives it to MOT
MOT takes box from CHI and holds it so CHI can draw
CHI puts crayon to paper to draw
CHI starts to draw then takes box from MOT and puts it on the floor
CHI flips box around getting it settled on the floor
MOT rolls ball out of CHIs way
CHI watches ball roll away then stands up and motions towards the ball
MOT rolls ball back toward CHI
CHI watches ball roll back towards her
<aft> CHI squats and starts to draw again
MOT holds her hands out with some crayons in them
CHI stands up and reaches to take a crayon from MOT
CHI takes a crayon from MOT
<aft> CHI squats and starts to draw again
<aft> CHI looks at crayons in MOTs hand
CHI stops drawing and takes another crayon from MOTs hand
CHI picks up crayon and puts it in MOTs hand
CHI looks at crayon then squats and draws with it
CHI sits and looks at crayon in her hand
CHI looks at crayons in MOTs hand
CHI puts crayon on MOTs hand then takes it back
MOT picks crayon off floor and puts it on her hand
CHI takes another crayon off MOTs hand
CHI holds crayon in her hands looking at it
CHI draws with crayon then stops and looks for more crayons
CHI picks up crayon and looks at it then takes a crayon off MOTs hand and looks at it
CHI hands a crayon to MOT
CHI looks at MOT then at crayons on floor
CHI hands a crayon to MOT
CHI looks at crayon in her hands
CHI picks up a crayon off the floor and hands it to MOT
MOT leans over paper and starts to draw
CHI continues to look down at something
MOT stops drawing and looks at CHI then starts drawing again
CHI looks at what MOT is drawing
CHI starts to draw with MOT
MOT sits back and watches CHI
CHI stops drawing and sits back and looks at paper
MOT scribbles on paper with crayon
CHI stops drawing and sits back and looks at paper
MOT scribbles on paper with crayon
CHI leans over paper and draws again
CHI stops drawing and sits up and puts crayon in mouth
MOT pulls CHIs hand and crayon out of mouth
CHI leans forward to draw again
CHI reaches for crayons in MOT hand
CHI tries to put crayon in mouth
MOT leans close to CHI grabs CHIs hand and shakes it
MOT sits back then leans towards CHI and shakes CHIs hand again
MOT scribbles on paper with crayon
CHI reaches for crayon on MOTs hand
CHI tries to put crayon in mouth
MOT leans close to CHI grabs CHIs hand and shakes it
MOT sits up and looks at CHI
CHI leans forward to grab a crayon
MOT takes crayon from CHI then stands up to get another box
end of Crayons and Paper Activity
MOT shakes box then sets it down in front of CHI
CHI looks at crayon in her hand
CHI tries to open the box
CHI looks at book holding it in her hands
MOT moves box and chair away from CHI
CHI watches what MOT is doing
MOT takes book and looks at it
MOT takes crayon out of CHIs mouth
CHI pick up another crayon and tries to put it in mouth
MOT grabs CHIs hand and shakes it leaning close to CHI
CHI reaches for another crayon in the box
CHI grabs more crayons and tries to put them in mouth
MOT grabs CHIs hand and shakes it then takes the crayon
CHI grabs another crayon and tries to put it in mouth
MOT puts crayons behind her back then holds her hands out closed for CHI to pick a hand
CHI picks up book and puts its corner in her mouth
MOT opens book for CHI to look at
MOT looks at pages of book
CHI picks up book and puts it in mouth
MOT looks at CHI then begins to reach for the book
MOT takes book out of CHIs mouth
MOT takes crayon and holds out hands for CHI to guess which hand it is in
CHI touches one of MOTs hands
MOT opens hand and shows CHI crayon
CHI waves arms up and down
CHI touches MOTs same hand again
MOT opens hand and shows CHI crayon
CHI waves arms up and down
CHI touches the same hand she just picked
MOT opens hand and shows CHI the crayon
CHI takes crayon out of MOTs hand
CHI tries to put crayon in mouth
MOT grabs CHI hand and tries to get the crayon
CHI moves crayon to other hand
MOT points to paper with index finger
MOT scribbles on paper with crayon
CHI starts to draw with MOT
MOT stops drawing and watches CHI
CHI stops drawing and looks at crayon
CHI takes crayon from MOT then almost falls backwards
CHI hands a crayon to MOT
MOT scribbles on paper with CHI
CHI stops drawing and watches MOT
MOT stops drawing and watches CHI
CHI climbs into box they were drawing on
MOT takes crayon then holds several crayons out to CHI on her hand
CHI lets go of book and takes the crayons from MOTs hand then hands a crayon back to MOT
CHI hands another crayon to MOT
CHI reaches towards ball and looks at MOT
MOT looks at CHI but gestures toward the ball with one hand
<aft> CHI rolls ball back to self
CHI tries to pick up ball
MOT picks up ball and tosses it against wall
MOT tosses ball against wall again
MOT tosses ball against wall several times until ball lands by CHI
CHI rolls ball back towards MOT
MOT tosses ball against wall again
CHI tries to color on rug
MOT tosses ball against wall again
CHI stands up then picks up paper out of box
MOT looks at paper then at CHI
CHI continues to look at paper
CHI tries to draw on paper in air
MOT leans close to CHI and looks at CHIs face
CHI squats and starts to draw on paper in box
MOT holds paper to steady it
CHI stands up and looks at paper in hands
CHI squats down and takes a crayon out of box and puts it on rug
CHI puts paper in box then picks it back up and looks at it again
INV opens door and enters room
